content_suggestions.issue: No dedicated professional summary tailored to the Computer Vision Engineer role.
content_suggestions.after_example: Summary: Senior Computer Vision Engineer with hands-on experience delivering end-to-end CV/ML solutions in industrial and satellite domains. Proven ability to lead cross-functional teams (up to 10) and deploy production-grade computer-vision systems, edge computing, and data pipelines. Fluent in English and Spanish, with strong communication and stakeholder management skills.
content_suggestions.justification: A tailored summary at the top improves human readability and helps ATS contextualize the candidate's fit for the role by foregrounding relevant skills and domain experience.

content_suggestions.issue: Non-standard/duplicated section names and potential ATS misinterpretation.
content_suggestions.before_example: Sections: Work Experience, Education, COURSES AND CERTIFICATIONS, Skills (with TECHNICAL SKILLS and SOFT SKILLS subsections).
content_suggestions.after_example: Sections: Summary; Work Experience; Education; Certifications; Projects; Skills; Languages.
content_suggestions.justification: Standardizing section names and ordering improves ATS parsing and human readability; ensures the resume aligns with common recruiter expectations.

content_suggestions.issue: Several typos/spacing issues in bullet lines (e.g., 'teamsof up to 10 people asProduct OwnerandSystems Engineer').
content_suggestions.before_example: Managed teamsof up to 10 people asProduct OwnerandSystems Engineer, leading the Technological Infrastructure and Science Data Processing subsystems of the SABIA-Mar satellite mission.
content_suggestions.after_example: Managed teams of up to 10 people as Product Owner and Systems Engineer, leading the Technological Infrastructure and Science Data Processing subsystems of the SABIA-Mar satellite mission.
content_suggestions.justification: Correcting spacing and capitalization improves readability and ATS keyword recognition.

content_suggestions.issue: Achievements exist but could be presented more impact-focused and aligned with CV/vision workflows.
content_suggestions.before_example: Led end-to-end a computer-vision production-control systemfor an industrial plant, covering design, production rollout and ongoing maintenance. The solution blends multi-object detection and tracking, edge computing, IoT protocols and real-time dashboards, enabling performance and efficiency monitoring.
content_suggestions.after_example: Led end-to-end development of a computer-vision production-control system for an industrial plant, covering design, rollout, and ongoing maintenance; integrated multi-object detection/tracking, edge computing, IoT protocols, and real-time dashboards to monitor performance and efficiency.
content_suggestions.justification: A clearer, consequence-focused phrasing strengthens impact without adding new claims.

content_suggestions.issue: Ambiguity around the AI division launch.
content_suggestions.before_example: Launched the company’s artificial-intelligence division, transferring expertise to the team and enabling the acquisition of new clients in computer vision and Industry 4.0.
content_suggestions.after_example: Launched the company’s AI division, upskilling the team and enabling acquisition of new clients in computer vision and Industry 4.0.
content_suggestions.justification: Concise, outcome-focused phrasing enhances clarity for both humans and ATS.

content_suggestions.category: Highlight quantifiable impact from available data
content_suggestions.issue: Some bullets describe activities without a measurable outcome.
content_suggestions.before_example: Implemented over20improvementstotheL0processoroftheSABIA-MarsatellitemissioninPython, fulfilling client-required functionalities within a 3-month timeframe.
content_suggestions.after_example: Implemented 20+ improvements to the SABIA-Mars L0 processor in Python, delivering client-required functionalities within three months.
content_suggestions.justification: Quantified phrasing (even when numbers are approximate or non-numeric) tends to improve ATS and recruiter perception.

content_suggestions.category: Irrelevant or low-value items to consider removing or re-categorizing
content_suggestions.issue: Section or items with limited relevance to the Computer Vision Engineer role.
content_suggestions.before_example: Publications (academic) and some early internship notes that do not directly map to CV/industrial inspection tasks.
content_suggestions.after_example: Option A (remove): Remove Publications from the main resume or relocate to a separate 'Publications' page if needed for academia-focused roles. Reason: For a senior CV/vision engineer role in industry, these items typically contribute less to the core assessment of job-relevant skills and can distract ATS and recruiters.
content_suggestions.justification: Reducing items with limited relevance helps maintain focus on job-relevant competencies and keywords.

content_suggestions.issue: Reference to 'Additional courses on LinkedIn profile' is noise.
content_suggestions.justification: Removing or omitting this line avoids ambiguity and keeps the resume concise.

skills_to_highlight: Image processing: object detection, segmentation, classification

achievements_to_add.before: Led end-to-end a computer-vision production-control systemfor an industrial plant, covering design, production rollout and ongoing maintenance. The solution blends multi-object detection and tracking, edge computing, IoT protocols and real-time dashboards, enabling performance and efficiency monitoring.
achievements_to_add.after: Led end-to-end development of a computer-vision production-control system for an industrial plant, covering design, rollout, and ongoing maintenance; integrated multi-object detection/tracking, edge computing, IoT protocols, and real-time dashboards to monitor performance and efficiency.

achievements_to_add.before: Implementedover20improvementstotheL0processoroftheSABIA-MarsatellitemissioninPython, fulfilling client-required functionalities within a 3-month timeframe.
achievements_to_add.after: Implemented 20+ improvements to the SABIA-Mars L0 processor in Python, delivering client-required functionalities within three months.

achievements_to_add.before: Launched the company’sartificial-intelligence division, transferring expertise to the team and enabling the acquisition of new clients in computer vision and Industry 4.0.
achievements_to_add.after: Launched the company’s AI division, upskilling the team and enabling acquisition of new clients in computer vision and Industry 4.0.

formatting_suggestions.suggestion: Use standard section names: Summary, Work Experience, Education, Certifications, Projects, Skills, Languages. Remove the 'COURSES AND Certifications' capitalization and unify to 'Certifications'.
Add a 2–4 sentence Summary at the top tailored to the Computer Vision Engineer role, referencing CV/ML, end-to-end deployment, and cross-functional leadership.
formatting_suggestions.example_after: Summary: Senior Computer Vision Engineer with hands-on experience delivering end-to-end CV/ML solutions in industrial and satellite domains. Proven ability to lead cross-functional teams and deploy production-grade CV systems, edge computing, and data pipelines.

formatting_suggestions.suggestion: Fix spacing and hyphenation inconsistencies and ensure uniform bullet formatting across sections.
formatting_suggestions.example_before: Managed teamsof up to 10 people asProduct OwnerandSystems Engineer
formatting_suggestions.example_after: Managed teams of up to 10 people as Product Owner and Systems Engineer

formatting_suggestions.suggestion: Standardize date formats and location structure for each role.
Consolidate technical and soft skills under a single Skills section with clear subsections (Technical Skills, Soft Skills).
formatting_suggestions.example_before: Skills > TECHNICAL SKILLS and SOFT SKILLS

formatting_suggestions.suggestion: Consider removing or relocating items like 'Additional courses on LinkedIn profile' and consider placing highly relevant items (projects) under 'Projects'.
formatting_suggestions.example_after: Removed or relocated to a dedicated Projects/Certifications page as appropriate.

formatting_suggestions.suggestion: Where possible, weave job-relevant keywords into the bullet points (e.g., 'defect detection', 'quality inspection', 'cosmetic grading' if applicable to the role) without adding fabricated claims.
formatting_suggestions.example_after: - Led end-to-end computer-vision production-control system for an industrial plant, enabling quality inspection and performance monitoring.
